transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hi, good morning sir. Main baat kar rahi hu Saima ji ho rahi hai. Saima meri services private limited.
Customer: Bolye kya baat hai.
Executive: Sir main Pratiksha baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART se.
Customer: Pratiksha madam aapko maine staff ka number diya hua hai waha par usse baat kijiye aap mujhse baat mat kijiye.
Executive: Sir actually na yaha par koi yaha par do number mention hai.
Customer: Actually kya hai na aap actually kya hai IndiaMART mein problem hai. Problem hai kya problem hai?
Executive: Bataye.
Customer: Problem ye hai ki har din naya aadmi samne aata hai. Har ek mahine ke andar koi naya aadmi aata hai.
Executive: Nahi sir main manager nahi hu.
Customer: Madam aap galat bol rahi hai ya to apne office ka address dijiye ab main aapko batata hu ki kitna account manager aapne change kiya hai.
Customer: Thik hai na aap humko phone hata na. Aise na account manager change karte rahenge koi kaam kar paye nahi.
Executive: Achcha sir aap unka number bata sakte ho kya?
Customer: Aap bataiye kya kare hum? Agar fir aap kisliye phone kiya bataiye mujhe.
Executive: Kya keh rahe sir?
Customer: Isliye phone kiya hai.
Executive: Sir by leads ke regarding hi call kariye aapko services ke regarding call kariye.
Customer: Kitni by leads aayi hai?
Executive: Video meet par sir aa jaiye ek baar main dikha deti hu aapko.
Customer: Nahi aap bataiye mujhe bataiye mujhe.
Executive: Kitni by leads aayi hai?
Executive: Bata rahi hu.
Executive: Ek second hold karega please main check kar rahi hu.
Executive: Sir ye account aapke employee dekh rahe hai kya?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Okay.
Executive: Saima meri services ya. By. Ha sir aap pan India deal kar rahe ho?
Customer: Ranchi. Do cheeze bata dijiye Ranchi only Ranchi thik hai aur bulk mein deal kar rahe ho ya fir retail mein?
Customer: Dekhiye ab aap malum hi nahi. Bataye kya kar rahe hai.
Executive: Sir main filter laga rahi hu.
Executive: Sir main filter laga rahi hu.
Executive: Ye abhi aapke paas aayi hui hai. Hmm ek second ha. Ye hai hospital cotton curtain crack ki hai aur ye aayi hai Vikramganj Bihar se.
Customer: Kab aayi hai?
Executive: Ye aayi hai kal.
Customer: Hmm?
Executive: Kal kal kal aayi hui hai sir.
Customer: Kis time aayi hai?
Executive: Sir isme to yesterday show ho raha hai mere paas.
Customer: Usse call kijiye aap apne phone se phone kijiye.
Executive: Sir mere paas authority hoti to main hi na aapko buyer se bhi mila ke deti.
Customer: To hum hum hum hum hum aapko bataiye aapka koi aadmi call kar raha hai to ghar mein curtain lagana hai. Ghar mein curtain lagana hai to ghar mein lagana hai curtain hum.
Customer: Hmm bataiye aap.
Customer: Jab aapne call nahi kijiye ga jo lead aapka jab aap call nahi kijiye ga ki jo curtain jo lead hai wo genuine hai ki nahi hai kaise malum hoga?
Executive: Sir isiliye to hum aapko baar baar services ke regarding hi to call karte hai ki aapne buyer se kya baat kari kuch deal final hui ya nahi hui sir aapke paas call jaati hai isiliye to jaati hai.
Customer: Koi call aati nahi hai.
Executive: Sir hum humari humari.
Customer: Time wasting time wasting call aati hai. Time ko wasting karne wali call bahut jyada aati hai. Waqt call call aati hai wo nahi aati jo kaam ke layak hogi. Isliye main avoid karta hu na.
Executive: Achcha abhi tak aapne by lead consume kari hai unse kuch baat hui kya aapki?
Customer: Wo sab koi kaam ki nahi lead hai.
Executive: Koi kaam ki nahi lead hai. Matlab kya baat hoti hai sir aapko mujhe voice recording bhejiye usme kya hai kya baat hoti hai aap sun lijiye usme. Koi apna personal to hoti nahi baat aap lead suniye usko kis se baat ho rahi hai malum hoga aapko.
Executive: Ki wo banda lead bhej raha hai wo kis kaam ka lead hai.
Executive: Achcha sir to matlab at least thoda bahut portal pe to active rahiye matlab main ye bol rahi hu.
Customer: Portal pe kya?
Executive: Keh rahi hu ki at least portal pe thoda bahut ek minute ha sir hold kar lijiye okay okay.
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Thik.
Customer: Dusra wala bhi right hai sir isme isme mujhe check kar liya hum isme mera jo hai 2 lakh aa raha hai sir.
Customer: Shakir bhai isme aa raha hai na 2 lakh?
Customer: Dono mein aa raha hai na?
summary:
Concerns:

- Dissatisfied with frequent account manager changes.

- Feels buyleads are not relevant or useful.

- Complains about time-wasting calls.

- Questions the genuineness of the leads.



Resolution:

- Executive offered to show buylead details on video meet.

- Executive explained the purpose of service calls.

- Executive asked the customer to stay active on portal.



Next Steps: 

- None



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, account manager, portal activity, services
